panels.title: TMDB Job - Seconds Since Last Success
Sport Job - Seconds Since Last Success

targets.expr: label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_saved_total{job="batch-job",step=~"tmdbMovieStep|tmdbTvStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[4m])),  "batch_job","fetchTmdbContentsJob","type",".*") or label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_saved_total{job="batch-job",step="sportApiStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[12m])),  "batch_job","fetchSportContentsJob","type",".*")

label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_new_total{job="batch-job",step=~"tmdbMovieStep|tmdbTvStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[4m])),  "batch_job","fetchTmdbContentsJob","type",".*") or label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_new_total{job="batch-job",step="sportApiStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[12m])),  "batch_job","fetchSportContentsJob","type",".*")

label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_duplicate_total{job="batch-job",step=~"tmdbMovieStep|tmdbTvStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[4m])),  "batch_job","fetchTmdbContentsJob","type",".*") or label_replace(  sum by (type) (increase(batch_content_duplicate_total{job="batch-job",step="sportApiStep",type=~"$type",step=~"$step"}[12m])),  "batch_job","fetchSportContentsJob","type",".*")
